channel.title: Additional Files
channel.description:
Okay, I am trying to add a few things to my Server but I would like to use .txt files to help me. So, I need these questions answered please: • How to make a command write something into a .txt file • How to make the Server check to see if there is something already written in the .txt file • How to make it so that if the Server finds something in the .txt file already, it activates something
Thanks!

item.title: Additional Files
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

Okay, I am trying to add a few things to my Server but I would like to use .txt files to help me. So, I need these questions answered please:
• How to make a command write something into a .txt file
• How to make the Server check to see if there is something already written in the .txt file
• How to make it so that if the Server finds something in the .txt file already, it activates something

Thanks!
